script.line: Is it like, something out of ten?
This isn't school, nerd. It's out of emojis.
...So then what do you give me?
Okay. We got it. Your Cool Rating is...

then.line: Kinda bad.
Nah. You're not kinda bad. You're really bad.
Yeah, some real bad tricks in there.
So I guess I have to go without finding out where Minty is, huh?
Price of being uncool.
But you know what?
What?
Nerd like you doesn't belong at the skatepark.
You'd probably fit in better in a museum.
You're really not--
The museum! You're trying to tell me to go to the museum!
Looks like you're pretty nice after all!
What? No, we just think you should leave, nerd. Go learn something.
Oh, I hear you. Loud and clear! I'll just take my nerdy self over to the museum!
Good, that's what we want.
Right! You want ME to go to the MUSEUM.
Yeah. That's what we said.
Pretty good?
Yeah. You kinda showed up for this one. Guessy you're... kinda cool.
I knew it! I knew I was cool!
So where's Minty?
You should check...the museum.
The museum? Huh... I guess that makes sense. Minty does love balls. I guess you saw her over there?
Sure, yeah. Totally.
Perfect! Thank you so so so so much, teens! Guess you're pretty nice after all!
Sure, whatever. But before you go... You named your moves after your dog, right?
I name a lot of things after my dog.
Must be a pretty cool dog. What does she look like, exactly?
Cute! Small! Curly tail! Perfect shining eyes, golden coat, white tummy, perfect brows.
And she answers to "Minty?"
Most of the time!
But... you must already know that. Because you saw her.
For sure, for sure.
Yeah, for sure. Just go to the museum. She's definitely there.
Amazing!
Look, don't get too excited, okay?
Coolness fades the more excited you are about it.
Oh. Well. Whatever.
Nice.
So... like, where should I look for Minty? You know, if I feel like it.
I don't know. Guess you could go to like... the museum or something.
It's mostly for nerds, but... maybe you could check it out.
Okay. Well. Maybe.
You're really good at this.
Maybe.
Cool.
Yeah.
All right, well. You said museum, right? I don't even remember. I wasn't listening.
Ball Museum, yeah.
Mm.

script.line: Haha, okay perfect! See you later, Teens! Thanks so much!
I've had a really... SKATE time hanging out!

then.line: That was not a cool person.
And yet... Kinda great, right?
May she never know.
We're gonna steal that dog, right?
Obviously.
Okay she was like, wildly cool, right?
I would protect her with my life.
